def_cn: 无记名投票；无记名选举；无记名表决
def_en: A ballot is a secret vote in which people select a candidate in an election, or express their opinion about something.
A ballot is a piece of paper on which you indicate your choice or opinion in a secret vote.

def_cn: 在…中间进行无记名投票（或表决）
def_en: If you ballot a group of people, you find out what they think about a subject by organizing a secret vote.
